segments.text: I'm here to sign the agreement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . The agreement hasn't been fully prepared . It will be ready by tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you speed it up and let us have it today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will try my best . Here is the draft . Would you please go over it and see if any modifications are needed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me have a look.Well , it contains basically all we have agreed upon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the terms concerning packing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you totally agree , I'll type the agreement this evening and have it duplicated for signatures .
segments.speaker: S2
